---
name: conversation-analyzer
description: |
  Analyzes conversation transcripts to find behaviors worth preventing with hooks. Use when running /hookify without arguments to detect problematic patterns.

  Examples:
  <example>
  user: "/hookify"
  assistant: "I'll analyze the conversation to find behaviors you want to prevent"
  </example>
model: inherit
color: yellow
tools: ["Read", "Grep"]
---
